    • Method Detail

      • lookupCurrentUser

        public ScpCfUser lookupCurrentUser()
                            throws UserNotAuthenticatedException,
                                   UserAccessException
        Retrieves the current user from the JWT bearer in the Authorization header of the current request.
        Returns:
        The current user.
        Throws:
        UserNotAuthenticatedException - If the current is user not authenticated.
        UserAccessException - If there is an issue while retrieving the user.

      • getCurrentUser

                    throws UserNotAuthenticatedException
        Returns the current User.
        Specified by:

        Returns:

        Throws:
        UserNotAuthenticatedException - If the current User is not authenticated.

      • getUserByName

        public com.google.common.base.Optional<User> getUserByName(String name)
        Returns the current User by its name, if it exists.
        Specified by:
        getUserByName in interface UserFacade
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the user to find.
        Returns:
        An optional, wrapping the user with the given name.
